EmailTemplate.description: This is the default email template for inbound cases. To change to a different default email template, edit the DefaultEmailTemplate apex class.
EmailTemplate.name: *Default Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Question for {!Organization.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting us! I've researched the issue and found an article that I think will help you. If you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to reply to this email or visit the {!Organization.Name} Community.
We are always looking to improve our customer service, so would you mind taking this brief survey about your experience?
Thank you! {!User.FirstName} {!Organization.Name} Customer Service
